title: Remote Security Assessment
headline: Evaluate and strengthen your setup remotely.
description: We offer remote security audits for local clients with a support plan. Identify weak points, tighten settings, and secure your systems from real-world threats without anyone stepping foot in your home or office.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Many devices and operating systems appear secure on the surface, but default settings often leave unnecessary services running or expose hidden attack surfaces.
Misconfigured firewalls, missing updates, reused passwords, and third-party browser plugins are among the most common entry points for attackers.
Even basic home or office systems can leak sensitive data, run outdated software, or rely on settings that have not been reviewed in years.

sections.heading: Included in Every Assessment
paragraph: We take a comprehensive look at your system settings, device posture, and digital habits to find weaknesses before someone else does.
items: Check system updates, software versions, and installed applications for known risks
Review firewall rules, antivirus behavior, and telemetry settings
Inspect account security, password use, and MFA configuration
Evaluate browser extensions, plugin risks, and privacy settings
Assess backup strategy, encryption practices, and disaster readiness
Deliver a written report with clear, ranked action items you can take immediately

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: This service is available only to local clients with an active remote support plan.
We connect securely and walk through your devices in real time, guiding you through each step of the audit.
Nothing is collected or stored. You stay in full control of your data the entire time.
At the end, you receive a summary with prioritized improvements tailored to your specific setup.
